Module sims.custpoint
Package sims.custpoint.dao

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
sims.custpoint.dao.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
A class holding static methods for communication with the Appointments table in the database linked in the JDBC class. Contains all CRUD actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBAppointments

      public DBAppointments()

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      public static boolean createAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      Inserts a new user into the Customers table with the provided fields.
      Parameters:
      title - The new appointment's provided title.
      description - A description of the new appointment.
      location - The location of the new appointment.
      type - The new appointment's type.
      start - The starting time and date of the new appointment. The application's LocalDateTime is converted to the database's UTC based Timestamp.
      end - The ending time and date of the new appointment. The application's LocalDateTime is converted to the database's UTC based Timestamp.
      customerID - The customer ID tying the new appointment to a Customers table entry.
      userID - The user ID tying the new appointment to a Users table entry.
      contactID - The contact ID tying the new appointment to a Contacts table entry.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing a successful insertion of data into the Appointments table.

    • getAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments()
      Returns an ObservableList-type list of appointments queried from the database. Holds all appointment IDs, titles, descriptions, location, and start and end times, as well as corresponding user IDs, customer IDs, and contact IDs for each row of data.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList-type list of Appointment objects.

    • getAppointmentByTitle

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentByTitle(String title)
      Returns an ObservableList-type list of appointments queried from the database based upon a provided title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title property that all appointments will be checked against.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList-type list of Appointment objects with a matching title field.

    • getAppointmentByID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentByID(int id)
      Returns an ObservableList-type list of Appointments queried from the database based upon a provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID property that appointments will be checked against.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList-type list of Customer objects with a matching ID field.

    • iterateQueryResults

      private static void iterateQueryResults(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentList, ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Iterates through a provided ResultSet and sets all items within to new additions in the provided appointmentsList. Operates via the mutable nature of the ObservableList. All database Timestamp objects are converted to LocalDateTime for localized use in the application.
      Parameters:
      appointmentList - The ObservableList object to contain all appointments returned from the database query.
      rs - The result of the database query run against the Appointments table.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Providing database access error information.

    • updateAppointment

      public static boolean updateAppointment(int appointmentID, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      Allows a user to change a specific appointment's information.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The appointment ID representing the entry in the database which will be updated.
      title - The title of the updated appointment.
      description - The description of the updated appointment.
      location - The location of the updated appointment.
      type - The updated appointment's type.
      start - The start date and time of the updated appointment.
      end - The end date and time of the updated appointment.
      customerID - The customer ID linking the updated appointment to the Customers table.
      userID - The user ID linking the updated appointment to the Users table.
      contactID - The contact ID linking the updated appointment to the Contacts table.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing the successful update of data.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int appointmentID)
      Remove a specific appointment from the Appointments database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be removed from the Appointments database.
